CustomField.description: This field will return true at the 7th Day of Delivery Date on Transport/Delivery sections
CustomField.formula: OR( Delivery_Date__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_2__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_3__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_4__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_5__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_6__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_7__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_8__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_9__c = TODAY() - 7, Delivery_Date_10__c = TODAY() - 7 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will return true at the 7th Day of Delivery Date on Transport/Delivery sections
CustomField.label: Is 7 Days After Delivery Date
